title: GetMinMaxTimestamps (Method)
text:
METHOD GetMinMaxTimestamps :
EAlarmStorageReaderErrors
This method determines minimum and maximum timestamp stored in the alarm storage.

rows.Name: GetMinMaxTimestamps
rows.Comment:
An EAlarmStorageReaderErrors indicating, whether the
processing was successful or not

rows:
Indicates, whether the database table is empty. The output parameter liMinTimestamp and
and liMaxTimestamp contain valid values only if this output parameter is FALSE.

The number of alarms, that are stored in the alarm storage
for the given timestamp
